node.title: Lukas Orda's family still in limbo after vet lost with livestock ship at sea
node.description: A year after he went missing, Lukas Orda's parents are no closer to finding out what happened to their son while government communication failures mean they have not been able to move on with their lives.
node.content:
["Lukas Orda would have been 27 last month.\u00a0", "The Queensland vet was among 41 crew members on board the Panamanian ship, Gulf Livestock 1, that disappeared, presumed\u00a0sunk, off the coast of Japan amid a typhoon during the early hours of September 3, 2020.", "Just two survivors were found.", "More than a year after his disappearance, Mr\u00a0Orda's parents are still unable to obtain a death certificate because the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT) failed to notify the Coroners Court of Queensland (CCQ).", "\"We can't move on. It's devastating and makes everything worse,\" said Lukas's father, Dr Ulrich Orda.", "\"You want to go on with life and you can't, you have no idea what happened, you have no closure.", "", "
Vet Lukas Orda was 25 when he went missing, leaving behind a young wife and child.(Facebook: Lukas Orda)
", "\"We have no official report, we do not even have a death certificate that would allow us to sort out bank accounts, the house that we're living in, taking over phone accounts or anything.\"", "Mr\u00a0Orda's widow and young son will spend a second Christmas wondering what happened to him.", "For the family, trying to get answers has been like screaming at a brick wall.", "They have spent the past 14 months reaching out to government agencies like DFAT, Australian Transport Safety Bureau (ATSB), and the Australian Maritime Safety Authority (AMSA) as well as international authorities.", "Dr Orda said they were met with circles of jargon-riddled email responses that provided little comment or passed the buck between agencies.", "\"We have written letters all the way up to the Prime Minister,\" he said.", "\"We have had just standard responses and not the feeling that anyone is trying to do anything.", "\"It's very difficult to come to terms with it because we have the feeling that the government just let us down.", "
Agency failures leave family in limbo
", "", "
Lukas Orda was a vet.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "DFAT is responsible for reporting presumed deaths like Mr\u00a0Orda's to the state coroner.\u00a0However, the CCQ was not made aware of the case until the Orda family contacted it in November this year.", "\"We found out that DFAT never actually contacted the coroner,\" Dr Orda said.", "Anthony Marinac from Pacific Maritime Lawyers said the oversight was surprising.", "\"In this case, DFAT should have reported the death to the coroner,\" he said.", "The CCQ told the ABC an investigation into Mr\u00a0Orda's reported death had now commenced.", "DFAT did not provide a response to the ABC's questions about why it did not report Mr\u00a0Orda's presumed death to the coroner.", "", "
Emma Orda's pleads for authorities to continue the search for her husband and other missing crew. (Supplied)
", "\"Our problem is that nothing has happened in the last 14 months, despite the fact that lawyers have tried to get some answers and determine responsible parties in relation to the tragedy,\" Dr Orda said.", "\"There are two survivors and someone must have their statements; we never got those statements, we never got any information.", "\"We've had no support at all.\"", "", "
The parents of missing Queensland vet Lukas Orda call on the government to continue searching for their son in September, 2020.(ABC News: Sofie Wainwright)
", "
What happens now?
", "Following the disappearance and search for Gulf Livestock 1 and its crew, the Panama Marine Authority (PMA) launched an investigation.", "The findings are due to be released to the International Maritime Organisation, which will then review the report.", "\"The safety investigation report corresponding to this unfortunate event is in the last stage of preparation/revision to be subsequently delivered to the IMO for consultations of the interested parties,\" the PMA said.", "The Orda family hopes the investigation will finally shed some light on what happened to the ship.", "The investigation outcomes will also play a key role in the coroner's process.", "\"Generally speaking, when there is an investigation underway from a specialist agency, the coroner will usually be told\u00a0to defer to that specialist agency,\" Mr Marinac said.\u00a0", "\"If the coroner can obtain those investigative findings, then this will obviously help, not just to determine whether Mr Orda died, but more importantly to determine how and why he died.\""]
